sentence.text: Differently from other digestive malignancies, gastric cancer (vitamin D metabolic process) carcinogenesis seems more heterogeneous and unclear.
This entails failing in identification of reliable serum tumor markers for screening early vitamin D metabolic process (EGC) as well as persisting ominous prognosis of this disease.

In the case of vitamin D metabolic process, in transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter, several cytological and molecular works have already demonstrated GJ to be an interesting biological material for improving clinicopathologic and prognostic knowledge of this cancer.

entity.text: transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter
